overview:
Founded 2005, FreshcellGroup provide fresh mobile marketing solutions in 16 countries for 50 mobile operators and media companies delivering high profitable quality entertainment through our advances technology platform, increasing ARPU and revenues.

Unlike many others we offer turnkey solution for mobile operators and brands including creative idea, prize fund, mechanics and FM radio and TV commercials that are created by us. We offer the greatest opportunity to freshen up your customers experience to join group of our best customers we value and work for. FreshcellGroup is all fresh marketing solutions and products
